DynamicLightHandler(int, Vector3, float)

Initializes a new instance of the DynamicLightHandler class.

public DynamicLightHandler(int lightCapacity = 256, Vector3 ambientColor = default, float ambientColorIntensity = 0.1)

Parameters

lightCapacity int

The maximum number of lights that can be stored.

ambientColor Vector3

The global ambient color applied to the scene.

ambientColorIntensity float

The intensity of the ambient color.

public ref Light this[int index] { get; }
